text: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
author: Laozi

text: One of the tests of leadership is the ability to recognize a problem before it becomes an emergency.
author: Olivier Messiaen

text: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
author: John C. Maxwell

text: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
author: John Quincy Adams

text: A leader or a man of action in a crisis almost always acts subconsciously and then thinks of the reasons for his action.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

text: I am not the first Buddha who came upon Earth, nor shall I be the last. In due time, another Buddha will arise in the world - a Holy One, a supremely enlightened One, endowed with wisdom in conduct, auspicious, knowing the universe, an incomparable leader of men, a master of angels and mortals.
author: The Buddha

text: A man must be big enough to admit his mistakes, smart enough to profit from them, and strong enough to correct them.
author: John C. Maxwell

text: Becoming a great leader doesn't mean being perfect. it means living with your imperfections.
author: Lolly Daskal
